A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointed with this movie..... so many things wrong with it... I don’t even know where to begin... I’m a huge StarWars fan and if anyone sees it and they “like” it\, then they have never seen any of the other Star Wars... I will sum this movie up in four reasons why. 1) No answer for Ray and who she connects with. 2) Snoke just randomly dies? 3) and no epic fighting battle between Luke and Kyler Ren? 4) Leia has the force when she was flown into space??? What?!?!? This movie should’ve been better but they ruined in.
